lead_paragraph: COLEN--Ruth Mintz, age 92, passed away peacefully at her home in Norfolk, Virginia on April 20, 2016. The eldest of two children born to Louis Mintz and Rose Lemel Mintz, she was predeceased by her brother Gerald Mintz in 2012. Wife to the late Leslie Colen, she was a loving wife, mother, grandmother, and great-grandmother. Living the majority of her life in Little Neck, Queens, she was devoted to her family and the community. She is survived by her two sons, both plastic surgeons - Dr. Stephen Colen (Dr. Helen Colen) and Dr. Lawrence Colen (Martha Colen), five grandchildren, and three great-grandchildren. Funeral services will be held on Monday, April 25 at 11:30am at New Montefiore Cemetery, West Babylon, NY. 1/3
